name: Big Brother
greetingText: I hope you're doing really great
wishText: I hope all your wishes come true. I love u so much and always take care. ;)
textInChatBox: Happiest birthday to my big brother i wish blah blah blah...
text2: I was going to just send you a text.
text3: But then I realized that i am a baby engineer.
text4: And, I wanted to do something
wishHeading: Happy Birthday to my big brother!
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
